text:
Hey team, looking to work with Sarah Chen for Pillow Talk. Budget is approx $4,450 - need 3 x Instagram post, 3 x 2-minute tutorial, 2 x 90-second product demo. 7 weeks exclusivity, 6 month engagement. Usage: 6 months. Start date: November 2025. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $4,450 budget

Need to confirm: deliverables
